comment.author: 12254609@N00
comment._content: Noticed there are 19 guys visible but only 11 rifles. I guess you wait for your pal to get taken out and then you use his rifle? Ugh. War.

comment.author: 48126758@N05
comment._content: Also notice for some reason people are quite relaxed on this photo.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: As this commentator indicated, most WWI battle scenes were posed, due to the long exposure times required, and the difficulties of live filming of subjects like trench warfare: germanhistorydocs.ghi-dc.org/sub_image.cfm?image_id=2125
